patthana4.4:1.1: Akusalaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:4.1: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo ca abyākato noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana4.4:5.1: Akusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:6.1: Abyākataṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:7.1: Kusalaṃ noāsavañca abyākataṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:8.1: Akusalaṃ noāsavañca abyākataṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:9.1: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:10.1: Akusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:11.1: Abyākataṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:12.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:13.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana4.4:14.1: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:15.1: Akusalo noāsavo dhammo akusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:16.1: Abyākato noāsavo dhammo abyākatassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:17.1: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:18.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.4:19.1: Kusalaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:20.1: Akusalaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:21.1: Abyākataṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:22.1: Kusalaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:23.1: Akusalaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:24.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:25.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:27.1: Kusalo sāsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:28.1: Akusalo sāsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:29.1: Abyākato sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:30.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:32.1: Kusalaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:33.1: Abyākataṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:34.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:36.1: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:37.1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:38.1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
patthana4.4:39.1: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:40.1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
patthana4.4:41.1: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:42.1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:43.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.4:44.1: Akusalaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:45.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:47.1: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto ca abyākato āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana4.4:48.1: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:49.1: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:50.1: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:51.1: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:52.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā satta …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:54.1: Kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:55.1: Akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:56.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:57.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:59.1: Akusalaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:60.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:62.1: Kusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:63.1: Akusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:64.1: Abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:65.1: Kusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:66.1: Akusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:67.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:69.1: Kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:70.1: Akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:71.1: Abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:72.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.4:73.1: Akusalaṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:74.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:76.1: Akusalaṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:77.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:79.1: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:80.1: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:81.1: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:82.1: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:83.1: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:84.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:86.1: Kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:87.1: Akusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:88.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:89.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana4.4:90.1: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana4.4:91.1: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:92.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:94.1: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:95.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:96.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:97.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:98.1: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:99.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:100.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:101.1: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana4.4:102.1: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:103.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana4.4:106.1: Akusalaṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… akusalaṃ ganthaṃ … oghaṃ … yogaṃ … nīvaraṇaṃ ….
patthana4.4:107.1: Kusalaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Āsavagocchakasadisaṃ.) Diṭṭhiṃ paṭicca diṭṭhi na uppajjati.
